entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
